document.full_text: hedge fund manager steven a. cohen, whose sac capital advisors has drawn scrutiny from prosecutors probing insider trading, said his firm has and will cooperate with all government investigations.
document.title: sac's cohen says firm cooperating with probe
lines_and_colors: hedge fund manager steven a. cohen, whose sac capital advisors has drawn scrutiny from prosecutors probing insider trading, said his firm has and will cooperate with all government investigations.
